definition[0]: used to show that you have not heard or understood a question
definition[1]: used at the end of a question, often to ask for agreement
example[1]: Not a bad little place, huh?
definition[2]: used to show disagreement or surprise, or to show that you do not find something impressive
example[2]: ‘She looks nice.’ ‘Huh! Too much make-up, if you ask me.’
